title: Looking for positive players
body:
I play mostly normal blind 5v5 games and I am looking for some nice people to play with, I don't care if you are godly or the worst LoL player on earth as long as you are nice, respectful and have fun!

Add Vincius

replies.body: why are we posting here.. its a year old

I am lvl 30. adc, support n mid are my strong suits. I hate top n jungle n meelee champs but i can jungle with nasus and jax. When i jungle, I build tank.
Strong suits: Xerath, Morgana, and ok LB for mid
ADC: Cait Main, Good with tristana and ok with ashe.
Support: Soraka, Morgana, Thresh and ok Braum.

Add me if you wanna play for fun. I hate toxic players so these few days i've been playing some bot games to try out jayce and get away from toxicity.

> [{quoted}](name=williana12,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=yWKHUWEn,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-02-26T17:22:09.543+0000)

> I am lvl 30. adc, support n mid are my strong suits. I hate top n jungle n meelee champs but i can jungle with nasus and jax. When i jungle, I build tank.
> Strong suits: Xerath, Morgana, and ok LB for mid
> ADC: Cait Main, Good with tristana and ok with ashe.
> Support: Soraka, Morgana, Thresh and ok Braum.

> Add me if you wanna play for fun. I hate toxic players so these few days i've been playing some bot games to try out jayce and get away from toxicity.

Wow we would go great in a team I love top and jg melee champs like Morde, Hecarim, Garen, and Udyr. And I suck mid and adc.
Added you all!

> [{quoted}](name=Vincius,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=yWKHUWEn,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2015-03-01T06:59:06.455+0000)
>
> Added you all!

Finally a Ray of sunshine in the hate filled world of league. You all remind me that there's some decency out there, your all awsome.
Play weird times as I work an off shift. Always looking for good folks to play with.
Same! Dincht :D
My name on LoL is xMalde. I would be happy to be able to join you guys!
I did = )
Added you :D please add me back
Added you all!

Hey! 
I've been playing on and off for about a year, so I'm still level 29. I want to learn roles other than my main (sup/mid) without getting flamed haha 
Add me too :)
sounds fun always good to have more peeps to play with

Hi!
I've been playing for a month, I'm not the best  but I hate toxic players and I just want to have fun and take the stress out, so you can add me if you want to. :)

No worries i'd be happy to help you out if you need it
I've been playing for a while and like to mess around c: I'd love to play with yah
I hate toxic players. i have been playing since beta was gold last season.....
Hi s4 here. Only playing for a few months. You can add me. Just want to play and have fun.
Cool I added you both = P

I'll join i've been meaning to look for some people for just some casual fun 5v5's 
Summoner name Frost388
I'm looking for ppl too. I'm a bronze player and s4 silver player slowly but surely climbing. My summoner name is: **III Mistakes III**
